doc.title: Frank's Cock
doc.plot: An unnamed homosexual protagonist (occupying one of the film's four separated frames on screen) tells the story of his relationship with his now deceased lover Frank, focusing on... Frank's huge member. A highly experimental film that (despite its crude title and apparent subject matter) deals with the bittersweet notion of love and love lost. The other 3 frames, showing everything from gay porn, to nature films, to Madonna's 'Erotica' video, work together visually with the protagonist's frame and voiceover to create a strong emotional impact on the viewer.
